name: Trash Time
description: Trash Time is a virtual reality game that can teach you how to recycle in a fun way. Burnt trash accumulates CO2 gas, that is one of the leading causes of global warming. Try to save the Earth by playing as a alien robot with flexible hands, recycle trash using powerups and power tools.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel i5-4690S or similar AMD CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel i7-7700 or similar AMD CPU Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 4 GB available space
